Posts.Content: Jun 5, 2008 01:46AM njnative wrote: I had a unilateral mastectomy with expanders and snb 2 weeks ago. I could drive as soon as I was off pain meds and that was after a week. I am a single mother and had my best friend stay with me for 4 days and was fine to get around after that. I really needed her more for moral support and to help with my kids. I took a leave from work for 4 weeks which seems just right. I still have my drains and should have for 4 weeks which is the only thing that is keeping me from doing more outside of the house. I'm sure everyone is different with recovery but other than having to sleep on my back and the soreness it's not as bad as I imagined. Hope this helps. Diane
